title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A rich and creamy Roman pasta dish made with egg yolks, cured pork (guanciale or pancetta), Pecorino Romano cheese, and black pepper.

title: Quick Chicken Stir-Fry
summary: A vibrant and fast weeknight meal featuring tender chicken strips, crisp mixed vegetables, and a savory soy-ginger sauce.

title: Vegetarian Lentil Soup
summary: A hearty, nutritious, and comforting soup packed with lentils, carrots, celery, and savory herbs.

title: Perfect Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: The quintessential American dessert. Chewy edges, soft centers, and plenty of melted chocolate chips.

title: Simple Caprese Salad
summary: A fresh Italian salad featuring slices of mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil, seasoned with salt, and drizzled with olive oil.

title: Fluffy Blueberry Pancakes
summary: Classic buttermilk pancakes studded with fresh blueberries.
